title: Radio service
creator_credit: Cecil Musk, Film Producers Guild and Cecil Musk Productions
brief_description: You may expect this film, because of its title, to show you what happens when you send your radio set to a mechanic for repairs. In fact, the film deals with the enormous development of electronics during the past 50 years (prior to 1948) of modern history. Commentator: Deryck Guyler.
